item.title: Installing & Configuring Tanzu Application Platform (TAP) v0.2 on an EKS Cluster with Azure Container Registry
item.description: Step by Step Instructions to setup TAP v0.2 on an EKS cluster along with Azure Container Registry and create secure software supply chain.
